titleStmt.title: Of the endes and deathes of two prisoners, lately pressed to death in Newgate. 1569

publicationStmt.publisher: By Iohn Awdely, dwellyng in litle Britaine streete without Aldersgate,

notesStmt.note: Verse - "True preachers which God liketh well,".
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
